channel.title: Connects then instantly disconnects
channel.description: I followed Storm cutters tut on Removing Thread Per Client and i got everything right and compiled but when i try and connect it shows a black screen like it is going to connect then disconnects and keeps retrying. This happens no matter what client i use. I am using Allstar scape v2 as a base how ever it hardly looks like it. Dose anyone know how i can fix this problem???

item.title: Connects then instantly disconnects
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

This is what the source says the client says nothing

Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4686 LoginPacket size: 72, RSA packet size: 32 Client type: low memory version dataFileVersion[0]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[1]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[2]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[3]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[4]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[5]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[6]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[7]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[8]: 0x0 UserId: 75775420 Ident: Ddddd:asd inStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x4192cc9 inStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x2641c4 inStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x5d4df2d inStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x28a5d76 outStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x4192cfb outStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x2641f6 outStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x5d4df5f outStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x28a5da8 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4687 LoginPacket size: 72, RSA packet size: 32 Client type: low memory version dataFileVersion[0]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[1]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[2]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[3]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[4]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[5]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[6]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[7]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[8]: 0x0 UserId: 75775420 Ident: Ddddd:asd inStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x58111c4 inStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x42ff8fb inStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x112e5b0 inStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x3ba7a4b outStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x58111f6 outStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x42ff92d outStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x112e5e2 outStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x3ba7a7d

I think its because i dont have a time out counter… I specifically remember skiping that part
